idea: To carry on in India the business of creating content, marketing, promoting, advertising franchising or dealing in any of the above activities both in internal and external markets, on digital media or any other online or digital means, on its own or through any sort or nature and to appoint sub-franchisers etc., for any of the above purposes, in India or elsewhere and marketing through online marketing, digital marketing in various sites. name: SOCIAL CARAVAN

idea: The LLP is formed to carry on the business as producers, distributors, exhibitors, consultants, technical consultant, advisor, importers and exporters of all entertainment activities including motion pictures, feature films, short films, promotional films, news and documentary films, satellite channel, T.V. Commercials, T.V. Serials, Government films, films, multimedia, interactive T.V. & Video, Web series & serials for digital space and to purchase, import, export, take on hire, or otherwise acquire (with or without negative rights) cinematograph films and motion pictures with distributing exhibiting and renting rights and dubbing, substituting the films and rights so acquired and also Company's productions with their exhibiting, distributing and renting rights or negative rights, both for Indian and Overseas markets.
name: MULTII VENTUREZ LLP

idea: Innovative Idea in the field of E-Pharmacy. Pre-Sorting and packing medicines as per prescription dosage. Enabled end-to-end with technology. Mobile App for Patients and suitable and robust back end for order processing via specialised tablet dispensing technology.

idea: An Experienced and Experiential Event Management Company, Providing Wide Range of Services, Magic Touch Has Created Several Programs for An Extraordinarily Diverse Clientele, Including Major Corporations, Non-Profit Organization, Advertising & Public Relations, Productions Houses & For Individuals. We Also Have Extensive Experience in Organizing Birthday Party, Advertisement & Product Launch, Opening ceremonies, festivals Events, sports Events and Many More
name: MAGIC TOUCH EVENTS

idea:
Sprint Tech Solutions Limited is a team of IT Professionals who had a
common vision of bringing Information technology advantages across
various industry levels.
STSL has been continuously evolving and adapting itself to provide Clients
with solutions towards Operational efficiency along with
significant cost benefits.
Our growth has been phenomenal over the years and today we stand and
compete among the best in this field. We provide IT Infrastructure
integration and technology process solutions on a pan-India basis. Our
diverse range of Products and Services makes us a preferred one-stop
solution provider for end-to-end IT Infrastructure setups
name: SPRINT TECH SOLUTIONS LIMITED
